The Real Profile of a Zombie Botnet Waking  Up and Taking Over an ISP's Customers Computers

Read this real, first-hand account of what happened this week when a zombie botnet woke up, based on some unseen signal triggered or programmed by the botnet owner, and took over hundreds of customers' computers at a large US broadband ISP!

Read more here: The Real Profile of a Zombie Botnet Waking  Up and Taking Over an ISP's Customers Computers
